title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects, the checkboxes do not display a busy cursor during the update process.
EB: The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be shown when updating checkboxes during the export of a Zip file in a workspace with many projects.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open a workspace with multiple projects.
2. Select the 'Export Zip' option.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose file types and press 'OK'.
5. Observe the checkboxes during the update process and notice the absence of a busy cursor.
